title: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area: Guide to the Gap
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Park Newspaper     Guide to the Gap                Guide to the Gap          The Guide to The Gap is the official annual park newspaper and is produced and distributed by the Division of Interpretation, Education, and Partnerships at Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area. Its goal is to orient the first-time visitor to the recreation area's resources, events, and issues.   2016 Guide to the Gap, 16 MB pdf 2015 Guide to the Gap, 8.7 MB pdf 2014 Guide to the Gap, 5.1 MB pdf 2013 Guide to the Gap, 3.1 MB pdf 2012 Guide to the Gap, 872 KB pdf 2011 Guide to the Gap
